item.description:
Come on out on Thursday!

Hey everyone! I've got some excellent news! As we have procured a space for Thursday night's Improv Incubator!!! It's right in Harvard Square! Plenty of space I assure you and plenty of options for afterwards.

If you need directions just take a look here.

http://www.democracyc...

Also, along with this new space comes new responsibility, I know I sound like a spider-man movie but we'll go over the rules and regulations before we start our fun on Thursday. Bring some energy and be excited. Let's welcome this new place with a solid night of improv and plenty of laughter!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I will probably be saying something only I think is funny!
item.name: YAY!!! a space in Harvard Square...Thursday Incubator! =o)
